amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute comprises the President's budget proposal and appears on page H3097 of the Congressional Record of April 9, 2014.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute numbered 1 printed in House Report 113-405 to insert President Obama's budget proposal.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 2 - 413 (Roll no. 171).

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Mulvaney.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 2 - 413 (Roll no. 171).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Mulvaney.
